title: Lerato Kganyago reveals when she had sex for the first time in new YouTube video
text:
Lerato Kganyago reveals when she had sex for the first time in new YouTube video share this

YouTube has become a main source of entertainment for many and while regular people start their own channels, local celebs such as Lerato Kganyago have also started their own channels where we get to know them even more personally.

In the latest episode on her channel, the Metro FM host held nothing back as she and her two guests, Clara Banx and her cousin, Koki discussed relationships, heartbreak and cheating among other things.

“This channel is all about fun. We’ll talk about everything. We’ll talk about my life, I’m going to be touching on things I don’t necessarily speak about in the media…,” she explained in the video’s intro.

During the conversation, the 37-year-old also revealed how she had sex for the first time when she was 24 years old.

“At 22 I was still a virgin. I lost my virginity at 24,” she said in response to Clara who revealed that she fell pregnant for the first time at 22.

The three ladies continued to speak about the challenges of dating, where Lerato revealed how painful it is to try and date as a celebrity because people are hardly genuine.

“A lot of times people meet ‘Lerato Kganyago, LKG, the mother’ you know,” she explained.

“Sometimes guys become such groupies to a stalkerish level and it gets too much because I wanna be loved. As much as I’m always portraying a strong, independent woman, I want to be loved by someone,” she continued.

The channel which she started two months ago, already has more than 14 500 thousand subscribers and five videos.
